name: Klawf
flavorText: Klawf hangs upside-down from cliffs, waiting for prey. But Klawf can’t remain in this position for long because its blood rushes to its head.

previous.name: Toedscruel
previous.flavorText: These Pokémon gather into groups and form colonies deep within forests. They absolutely hate it when strangers approach.

next.name: Capsakid
next.flavorText: The more sunlight this Pokémon bathes in, the more spicy chemicals are produced by its body, and thus the spicier its moves become.
